attributes.action: make it illegal for ex frontline ambulances to be sold with the emergency warning equipment and battenburg on it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ex ambulances are becoming more and more common on websites such as ebay, and they still have their markings, lights and sirens fitted to them because the leasing companies do not take them off, this is a serious issue as it can lead into many other things including terrorism.
